sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for incubation of microbial cultures using a bacterial incubator.
sections.scope: Applicable to incubation of microbial cultures in the Microbiology laboratory.
procedure: Allow the incubator to stabilize at set temperature.
Place inoculated culture plates or tubes inside.
Incubate for the specified time period.
Remove cultures after incubation and switch OFF the incubator if not required.
sections.precautions: Avoid frequent opening of the incubator door. Handle cultures carefully.
